messages.messageBody:
Thank you Ren!!

Also, can you change the description of my blog to "Shortly after
adopting a sibling group of three, we removed them from school and
bagan unschooling".

Thanks again!

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com

messages.subject: Uploading files
messages.msgSnippet: Got it!! I searched back over the posts to see what you wanted me to add, but couldn t find it for some reason. I should have known it was the blog carnival!
messages.messageBody:
Got it!! I searched back over the posts to see what you wanted me to
add, but couldn't find it for some reason. I should have known it was
the blog carnival! duh.

I've added a bunch of unschoolers blogs to the links section and
updated a couple other things. If anyone else keeps a blog and doesn't
see themselves listed, please let me know.

Also, if you are listed and want the description changed in any way,
give me that information also. :)

Thanks everyone!

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Uploading files
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry for being absent so much this week...having too much fun.:) I blocked members from uploading files because we were getting weirdos joining (not the good
messages.messageBody:
Sorry for being absent so much this week...having too much fun.:)

I blocked members from uploading files because we were getting weirdos
joining (not the good weird, just weird weird) and putting
inappropriate links there. Anytime you want to add a link, just email
it or post it and I'll get it added!:)

Thanks,
Ren
learninginfreedom.com
